me siddhiya sambana්dhayen saukhya amathyanshaya sidu karana wimarshana katayuthuwaladi rogiyage anda ihapath warthawa wadagath sakshiyak wana bawa saukhya amathyanshaya prakasha karayi.siddhiya sambandhayen sidu karana wimarshanayedi anda ihapath warthawe wenaskam wima walakwime aramunen rohale adhyakshikawata mewani upadesak laba di thibe.mathara achala priyadarshani namathi me nithi shishyawage suwaduk wimasa balimata saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pereda (27) jathika rohalata giya athara me siddhiya sambandhayen waradikaruwan wana pudgalayanta erehiwa dadiwa nithiya kriyathmaka karana bawata amathiwaraya prakasha kara atha..
me para nam perethakamata hariyanna wayin biwwa.
tika welawakin deyiyoth aawa.
aththa washayen ee thanwala dewiyan sitinuwaා nam mebandu illim karana ayata dewala bhumiye hathara mayimata ennata ida no denuwa atha.
–“awasana washayen binku mage lipiye damu prathicharayaka kotasak mada obata kiyami.
akabanika rasayanaya da ee sadaha sambandha we.

emenma indiyanu sinamawe purogamin bahutharaya aniyamin ho indiyanu nidahas wimukthikamin samaga sambandhakam pawathwuwan wu waga owunta rahasak nowiya.ema warana nithi balapawe indiyanu chithrapata walata pamanak nowa aanayanitha chithrapata kerehi da ema warana nithi ekase balapam kaleya.1921 saha 22 dewasara athulatha wideshayangen aanayanitha chithrapata sankhyawa 1320 k (wruthantha 615,keti chithrapata 705) wiya.samastha indiyawa pura nishpaditha chithrapata sankhyawa 63 k wiya.nidahas aragalayata paksha mathawada samaga indiyanu sanskruthiya piliebada wada boho indiyanu ugathun gaurawayen katha kalaha.
